articles.author: Matthew Continetti, Matthew Continetti
articles.title: Coronavirus and Xi Jinping’s Crisis of Legitimacy
articles.description: China is isolated, losing face,  and has given the world a public-health emergency.

articles.author: Tobias Hoonhout, Tobias Hoonhout
articles.title: World Health Organization Declares Spread of Coronavirus a Global Health Emergency
articles.description: The World Health Organization on Thursday declared the outbreak of the coronavirus a 'public health emergency of international concern.'

articles.author: Tobias Hoonhout, Tobias Hoonhout
articles.title: CDC Confirms First U.S. Human Transmission of Coronavirus
articles.description: The Center for Disease Control on Thursday confirmed the first U.S. case of human-to-human transmission of the coronavirus involving a Chicago woman.

articles.author: Zachary Evans, Zachary Evans
articles.title: Tom Cotton Claims Coronavirus Epidemic ‘Much Worse’ than China Admits
articles.description: Cotton has repeatedly pushed for a travel ban to China due to concerns over the spread of the virus.
